Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.name: countryPickerDidCancel(_:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user cancelled the pick operation.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.name: countryPicker(_:didSelectCountry:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user picked a country.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.name: countryCodes(for:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source to provide a collection of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes for the specified country picker view controller.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.name: GCCountryPickerDataSource
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.abstract: The data source of a GCCountryPickerViewController object must adopt the GCCountryPickerDataSource protocol.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html.name: GCCountryPickerDelegate
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html.abstract: The delegate of a GCCountryPickerViewController object must adopt the GCCountryPickerDelegate protocol.

Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html#/s.name: withCallingCodes
Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html#/s.abstract: The country picker will include calling codes.

Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html#/s.name: withoutCallingCodes
Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html#/s.abstract: The country picker will not include calling codes.

Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html.name: GCCountryPickerDisplayMode
Enums/GCCountryPickerDisplayMode.html.abstract: The display mode of the country picker.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.name: countryCode
Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.abstract: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/c:@M@GCCountryPi.name: localizedDisplayName
Classes/GCCountry.html#/c:@M@GCCountryPi.abstract: The localized display name for the country.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.name: init(countryCode:)
Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated country.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: delegate
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the country picker view controller.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: dataSource
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The object that acts as the data source of the country picker view controller.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: init(displayMode:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated country picker view controller object.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: GCCountryPickerViewController
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The GCCountryPickerViewController class defines a view controller containing a country picker interface.

Classes/GCCountry.html.name: GCCountry
Classes/GCCountry.html.abstract: The GCCountry class defines an object that contains the country code, calling code, and localized display name for a country.
